resources.string: NiTran(9Tran) is a Multi - Lingua Translation Mobile App made by Nigerians, in Nigeria, for Nigerians in Diaspora and Individuals all over the World interested in learning any of the listed Nigerian languages. \n Language is the dress of thought. It has life, it is either living or dead, Our languages must not die!!!

We like to Thank the entire
